Love, Courtney.translation[0].definition: (1964â€“) a US singer, songwriter, and actress. In the 1990s, she was in the rock group Hole, which was known for having a loud, angry style. She is also famous for having been married to Kurt Cobain. She has appeared in several films, including The People vs. Larry Flynt (1996). Her birthname is Courtney Michelle Harrison.
